long_description: Soothe your furry friend's cuts and scratches with the all-natural Healers Calm Coat Topical Spray. All-natural blend of essential oils provides relief from itching, reduces inflammation, encourages healthy skin and hair growth and aids hot spot healing. Spray container allows easy application; formula is safe to use directly on lesions, scratches, cuts and superficial wounds. Provides SPF 7 sun protection and soothes sunburn. Intended for use on dogs, cats and other small animals.
short_description: Soothe your furry friend's cuts and scratches with the all-natural Healers Calm Coat Topical Spray.
